alert.note: Alert for Lower Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 3:23AM CST until January 16 at 9:00AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Freezing rain possible. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Lower Terrebonne Parish in southeast Louisiana. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Sidewalks and roads, particularly bridges, overpasses, and lesser traveled secondary roads, may become slippery. The hazardous conditions could impact the commute late tonight and Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A mix of rain, light freezing rain and freezing drizzle is currently moving across this area this morning. Precipitation ends from west to east not too long after sunrise this morning, but remaining water on roads freezing icy roads are likely to continue into the morning commute as any remaining water on roads could quickly freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
